entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
